data.name: VR SEX
data.detailed_description:
Set in a hotel overlooking Las Vegas, you take on the form of a beautiful woman and enjoy phantom sensations, have sex with beautiful girls, and soak in the nightscape.
Standing doggy sex with Las Vegas in the background is the best feeling ever.
You can also experience walking around outside the room high above the city.

Controls:
You can move around freely. 6DoF supported. You can switch between events by touching the cube.


Persons involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

data.short_description: A VR game in which you can have sex overlooking a stunning Las Vegas nightscape. Enjoy some quality time with gorgeous girls.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Ukrainian*, Dutch*, Greek*, Swedish*, Thai*, Czech*, Danish*, Turkish*, Norwegian*, Hungarian*, Finnish*, Bulgarian*, Vietnamese*, Portuguese*, Polish*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Japanese*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce® GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains content or themes that are appropriate only for adult.

Themes in this game include:
> Explicit consensual sex scenes
> Nakedness
> genitals
> lewd situations

All persons involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.
